title: Featured games to spectate, gone!
body:
Why has the Featured Game Spectate panel been removed?

Really, in favor of plugging facebook?
It's exhausting every time Riot removes it for some stupid thing. Let me X the ad closed or something so I can get the spectate-able games back? Would that be so awful?

I wouldn't have bothered making a post but for some unknown reason I can't join public chat rooms where I'd add a dozen randoms in the hopes of spectating something.

replies.body: Go to the league system: view challenger tier, select top 5 solo queue, scroll through and spectate one of them.

That's actually helpful, thankyou. 

Though I'm still gonna leave my complaint, because it was such a simple system having it cycle through a bunch of games on the front page.

I don't expect you to not complain, i was just giving a thing for until June 1 when their plug finishes :P

Honestly it pisses me off too, because i do actually like having looks at featured games, i just do this more often because i'm confirmed a high elo game to watch, and unless i'm looking for a certain champ, i use the challenger system.
Aye fair enough. I'll remember anyway, cheers buddy.
It's really annoying me to. I actually enjoy watching a lot more than i do playing a lot of the time.
